storyInfo: It turns out that Zuo Le, the youth, and Innkeeper Zheng are responsible for stealing the goblet. Both seem to have had a deal, and Kroos tracks them down, gaining more information from Miss Du as she does. Lee receives a clear-cut task from Liang Xun.

attributes.content: This isn't it...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If things were really so simple, then I would find myself worried about Mr. Liang's eye for talent.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mr. Zheng, do we know anything about the visitor from Lungmen yet?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He's an old friend of Liang Xun's.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Anything special about him?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We have a few unclear leads, but I can at least guarantee that this affair has nothing to do with Lord Wei.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: That's my father's greatest worry taken care of.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: True though, considering the sort of methods that Lord Wei of Lungmen usually employs... If he were involved, we wouldn't be sitting here enjoying tea right now.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I've heard many anecdotes about him over the years. It's a shame that I've never had the chance to visit Lungmen to see his exploits with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm surprised that you'd show such a keen interest in someone like him.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I walked the world of kung fu in my younger years, and I've heard he's fine swordsman. That's all.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I see. It's true that he's a swordsman... As for his swordsmanship, though, all I know is rumors.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In any case, can we assume it was Mr. Liang himself who chose to involve the Lungmenite?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Undoubtedly.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hm... He is the only remaining variable, and also Mr. Liang's only trump card.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Mr. Liang should've been on our side. The man he chose should not have tried to deceive me either. It was an illogical move.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Mr. Liang doesn't have much of a choice himself. If only... *Sigh*... No, it wouldn't have mattered.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Isn't her presence in Shangshu the reason everything has gotten so out of hand?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks... A place graced by the presence of a deity.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: In eras past, Shangshu was a place where many dreamed. Not only people but all inanimate things. As the saying goes, all things in the world can be deified with souls, and all words in the realm can be summarized in a sigh.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: According to legend, a millennium ago the Yanese towns were scattered all over the country. It was only when our Shangshu forebears all collectively saw the same dream that they chose to settle down on these lands.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The legends of Shangshu have always been so magnificent.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Outsiders may see it as mere legend, but to the locals it is history.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The Operator from the medical company... Kroos, was it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If it wasn't for your help, she would likely have caught up to me. You have my thanks, Mr. Zheng.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You once saved my daughter from having her hotheadedness lead to disaster. It is only natural for me to come to your aid.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: At the end of the day, Rhodes Island is an unknown. What do you think, Innkeeper?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: They are not a part of the game.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: They are nonetheless standing very close to the table.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hmm... I rarely see young a woman with such fine techniques, though. Seeing her chase after you gave me a good idea of her abilities.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: And what's your assessment?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: She may be young, but she's a battle-hardened veteran.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Hoh? Did you arrive at that conclusion as Zheng the Innkeeper or Zheng Qingyue, the Asker to the Frost?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Both.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You haven't once looked away from that fake cup.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm only reminiscing... reminiscing about the goblet's original form.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: When we crossed that wilderness all those years ago... we ran into a group of bandits. None of them spoke Yanese, and we hadn't the slightest idea where they came from.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: They blew up the caravan and tried to steal our wares, though our Escort Association colleagues stopped them. Still, there were far too many, all obsessed with our wares, and they followed us for two hundred li.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It was raining. Visibility was low, and there was nary a light in sight. The bandits, who knew the terrain much better, followed us like shadows.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: We were afraid to counterattack, lest they have some kind of underhanded trick up their sleeves. We were too afraid to run either, lest we couldn't shake them.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: From what I heard, the Sui Regulator once secretly commissioned the renowned Xingyu Escort Association to transport an item, only for it to be lost in an accident en route.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That was my fault.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm afraid I'm not very good with comforting words, Mr. Zheng.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I simply never expected that the next time I met a crossbowman of such horrifying prowess would be in my hometown, in the dead center of the city, under a well-lit night, all for the same goblet.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I truly... cannot begin to explain how I feel.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: How did you escape then, Mr Zheng?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: When do you mean?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Oh... The incident you were just talking about, of course. My father always tells me that I am still young and inexperienced, and should learn from my elders.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If you would continue to share your story with me, I'll gladly listen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Luck was on my side that night...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Two of my men were hurt. Good men. Neither of them made it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The Association's rule is to 'save the goods, then the men.' We all knew the risks when we joined the business.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But with the injured dead and the goods threatened, that actually freed us to do as we pleased.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It was pouring that night. Helped to wash the blood off our blades.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: So you just need me to find the cup's owner?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: By owner, you mean a buyer or collector?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Not quite. It would be a much simpler matter if that were the case.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Hm, that's strange. This cup was shockingly cheap, but according to the black market appraisal I stole from the smugglers, it seems...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's an actual antique, through and through.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Who's the man of the hour then?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I don't know their name... Nor anything else, really. Their gender, their race, their age...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Well... Where am I supposed to start then...? Are you even sure they're in Shangshu?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That much is certain, and only that.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How do you know? Suppose our friend decides to take a trip, wouldn't that make this a huge waste of time?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No, they are in Shangshu. I can guarantee you that.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If they had left Shangshu... I would have been notified.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Strange. So you can monitor them, but you can't locate them?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's right...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Are they some kind of monster or enlightened deity?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You'll know what I mean once you see them.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So they must leave some kind of indication that they're here... Is this the kind of funny business government officials have to deal with these days?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Fine, I won't probe any further if you don't want to tell me. It's just, that's not much of a lead in a town this big...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: They're most likely hiding in one of the Three Mounts.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How do you figure?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Our friend is unpredictable, but every once in a while they show up at the mountainside liquor shops to buy alcohol, with no regularity whatsoever.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: But they've never come down to the valleys, nor have they ever appeared in the nomadic cities. In which case, they're most likely somewhere in the mountains.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Very well, then. The Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks it is. Sounds like a fun trip.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Legend has it that our friend is an appreciator of fine weather and scenery. And they enjoy lounging in pavilions and writing poetry all the more.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Legend, huh?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It is more than mere legend, actually...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: So you're familiar with them?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Not exactly.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: In the end, you may just have to try your luck, troublesome as it sounds.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Do we have a deadline?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'd appreciate it if you'd take care of this as soon as possible. As you can tell, a few too many people are already mixed up in this affair. The longer it continues, the greater the chance it will get even more out of hand.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: As for the cup... Seeing as someone has their eyes on it, we should keep it in the safety of my estate.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Amazing, Mr. Liang. First you had me bring it to you across thousands of li, then you want me to find its owner, and now you won't even let me hold it?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're really putting me in quite a bind. Perhaps next time you'll arrange for me to help you from the comfort of Lungmen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is a sign of my trust in you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: It's true though that if someone has their eyes on it, then keeping it on my person is asking for trouble.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: As for the Xingyu Inn...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We're investigating it. Be careful on your way. If you need help, I can arrange for someone to accompany you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: No need. A bodyguard tagging along would just make me stand out. It's trouble, and you know it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you certain you'll be fine on your own, though...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Sure, as long as you aren't hiding anything else from me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm looking for someone, not investigating a scary smuggler ring in Lungmen. How much trouble can it be?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: At least talk to Master Shen. As a veteran boatman, he can help you get anywhere in Shangshu.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Incidentally...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Is there a Zuanjiang Peak among Shangshu's Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Urgh! Just how stubborn are you, bitch?!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Well, you're the only lead I've got. Not letting you go.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You're all alone, with no lackeys. And are you sure you want to start a fight in a bustling part of town like this?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: How much did that thief from Lungmen pay you to cover him like this?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I don't know how things got to this point, but Mr. Lee is one of our most important partners.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Partners? Business then. And you believe him, just like that? You sure he's not swindling you?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I trust Rhodes Island, so I trust him. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh...? Seems we won't be coming to an agreement, then.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Looks like.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But Innkeeper Zheng also said not to get you any more mixed up in this than you already are.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh... Judging by your reaction, Mr. Lee got it right, then? You're in this with the innkeeper?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You... Playing me for a fool, are you?! You're just some shady girl from who-knows-where! How dare you make a fool of me!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Fine, I'll make sure you pay for this!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: So we're doing this for real, huh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Alright, I've actually got a few things to ask you—Nothing to do with Mr. Lee, but still.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Regarding Miss Du...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: She may be my daughter, but I'm ashamed to say she is still very immature.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No, she's your family. I am in no position to meddle in your household affairs.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How many inns and restaurants have you opened here in your town?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hohoh... I've spent my entire my life savings on this business. Fortunately, my old pals take care of me these days. The connections I made over the years finally came in handy.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: *Sigh*... While it takes connections to survive in this business, of course, in the end it's all down to how capable you are. Being a businessman is another thing entirely. It takes skills to start a business, but connections to build it up.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No doubt you are already well aware of that though.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Not at all. My father always tells me what youngsters like me lack isn't persistence or conviction. It's an understanding of everything that surrounds us.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wise words. Indeed, being holed up in a castle in the clouds is no way to live.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Still, General Zuo is a good father, but it doesn't matter what your father thinks. What is truly important is... what you think.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Don't worry about that too much. When you are young, there is no shame in letting your frustration, curiosity, or anger get the better of you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: On the contrary, young man, you don't want to lose your edge too early.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Thank you for your advice.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: *Sigh*... My advice wasn't just for you. It may sound simple, but it is no simple matter. I had to hear it for myself, all the same.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: My daughter... What a headache she is.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ––Hraaaagh!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Hm. Nice moves.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Spare me the act... It didn't even connect.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: How come you're like a whole different person when you're fighting...? My mate Mr. Nothing is like that too. Are all you Yanese like that?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I don't want to hurt anyone, that's all.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You called us thieves, didn't you? Aren't you going a little too easy on a thief?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Save it.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: That's not going to fly this time.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Heh... How about we stop beating around the bush, then?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Sure thing, I'm all for it. Gotta warn you, though. I'm not exactly speaking for Mr. Lee here.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. Neither you nor that conman are the honest sort. The sooner we get this conversation over with, the better.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Who did you say you were again?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Codename Kroos, an Operator currently on deployment from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: So Mr. Nothing is that guy's codename?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Something like that. He's not quite on the job just yet, though.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You work behind fake names, hiding knives beneath your smiles. What a sketchy lot.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Whoa... Never heard that one before...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Someone hired us to take the cup back from the Lungmenite.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yanese is a tricky language, and I can't say I've had time to master it, but wouldn't you say using the phrase 'take back' here is a little too convenient?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I trust Mr. Lee. If you really had a grievance, or if this were all a misunderstanding, did it really have to come to blows?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This is the Yanese heartland, not Siracusa or Bolívar... violence won't get you anywhere.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I have my reasons to open with hostilities instead of courtesies... That said, do you seriously not know anything?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Oh, so now I'm the one who's getting played for a fool, huh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: If you really don't know, you'd best stay out of this and dig no further. I've already spoken with the Lungmenite. If you insist on sticking your nose into this, you'll ruin it for everyone.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Well, aren't a righteous one?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What we are doing is righteous. Naturally, our reasons are righteous too.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Now that I've told you this much, I might as make this clear, whether you believe me or not:
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —I didn't rob the Liang estate.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But you know who did.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Perhaps.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You say you've already talked to Mr. Lee... so how about a truce? Can you give us an explanation we'd accept?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: An explanation...?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: You said the Lungmenite was hired by Magistrate Liang to deliver a goblet from Lungmen—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —So the one who hired the Escort Association could be someone even Liang Xun is afraid to offend.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It's beyond complicated. Don't count on me to explain it to you.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Miss Du!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Benefactor! Are you alright?!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You punk! You here to get in our way too?!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: I haven't even said anything yet!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Get him, boys!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Hmph... That's enough chit-chat for one night. Excuse me.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Get out of here. Stop badgering that guy already!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —Alright!
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Hey, first you say you'll come get me, and now you don't?! Must you always give me such trouble?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: —Hold on!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You ain't half bad, and you know how to listen. So I'll leave you with a piece of advice—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —The mountain rapids are turbulent and steep! Stay out of this!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Benefactor.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I'm fine... Don't worry.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Miss Du, are you okay?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Aren't those two working with the Lungmenite? Why don't we just tell them the truth?
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Old Man Zheng wants to dump this on us... Well, that's not going to happen.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: I've got a deal with the Lungmenite. The old banner has flown long enough. It's time to switch it out for a new one.
attributes.name: Miss Du
